qas.question: Which level of schools in Southampton are the worst behaved in the UK?
How many times the national average are the suspension rates at Southampton's secondary schools?
Out of about every 14 students, how many will be suspended from school?
In addition to physical attacks, what other kind of assault do Southampton's students commit against staff more than anywhere else in the country?

context: It has been revealed that Southampton has the worst behaved <a0_0>secondary<a0_0/> schools within the UK. With suspension rates <a1_0>three<a1_0/> times the national average, the suspension rate is approximately <a2_0>1<a2_0/> in every 14 children, the highest in the country for physical or <a3_0>verbal<a3_0/> assaults against staff.
